abstract: Sgt. Jeffrey Sarver said the film was based on him without his permission.
snippet: Sgt. Jeffrey Sarver said the film was based on him without his permission.
lead_paragraph: Score one for the screenwriter. A United States District Court judge in Los Angeles has dismissed a lawsuit by an Iraq war veteran, Sgt. Jeffrey Sarver, that claimed the film "The Hurt Locker" was based on him without his permission and that he had suffered ridicule because of it and was denied employment.
